The provided code chunk declares global configuration variables used throughout the exception handling and logging system. These variables control whether stack dumps should be logged or uploaded, track reasons for variable dumping, and determine if exception initialization should trigger variable dumping. They are initialized at the top of the document to ensure they're accessible wherever needed in the script.

oldExcepthook = None
# store these values here so that Task.py can always reliably access them
# from its main exception handler
wantStackDumpLog = False
wantStackDumpUpload = False
variableDumpReasons: list = []
dumpOnExceptionInit = False
